field.name: ma_dvcs
field.check: ma_dvcs not in (select ma_dvcs from dmdvcs where status = '1')⩓ma_dvcs in (select distinct ma_dvcs from dmdvcsks where year(ngay_ks) >= @nam)⩓ma_dvcs not in (select distinct ma_dvcs from sysunitrights where user_id = @user and r_new = 1)⩓exists(select 1 from ctns b where @@table.ma_dvcs = b.ma_dvcs and @@table.tk = b.tk and @@table.ma_bp = b.ma_bp and @@table.ma_phi = b.ma_phi and b.nam = @nam) and @@table.ma_dvcs not in (select distinct ma_dvcs from sysunitrights where user_id = @user and r_edit = 1)

field.name: tk
field.check: tk not in (select tk from dmtk where loai_tk = 1)

field.name: ma_bp
field.check: ma_bp <> '' and ma_bp not in (select ma_bp from dmbp)

field.name: ma_phi
field.check: ma_phi <> '' and ma_phi not in (select ma_phi from dmphi)

field.name: tk_k_gt
field.check: tk_k_gt <> '' and tk_k_gt not in (select tk from dmtk where loai_tk = 1)

field.name: t_tien
field.insertValue: (tien01 + tien02 + tien03 + tien04 + tien05 + tien06 + tien07 + tien08 + tien09 + tien10 + tien11 + tien12)
field.updateValue: (b.tien01 + b.tien02 + b.tien03 + b.tien04 + b.tien05 + b.tien06 + b.tien07 + b.tien08 + b.tien09 + b.tien10 + b.tien11 + b.tien12)

field.name: t_tien_nt
field.insertValue: (tien_nt01 + tien_nt02 + tien_nt03 + tien_nt04 + tien_nt05 + tien_nt06 + tien_nt07 + tien_nt08 + tien_nt09 + tien_nt10 + tien_nt11 + tien_nt12)
field.updateValue: (b.tien_nt01 + b.tien_nt02 + b.tien_nt03 + b.tien_nt04 + b.tien_nt05 + b.tien_nt06 + b.tien_nt07 + b.tien_nt08 + b.tien_nt09 + b.tien_nt10 + b.tien_nt11 + b.tien_nt12)
